name: Sanders Sides RPG Test V2
description:
THIS IS NOT A FINISHED VERSION!

im no developer, im just a fan of sanders sides who used rpgmaker mv to make a fangame, this is so i can link this to beta testers who will help play and critique my game since its probably sucks

this is the second version, i fixed some glitches and added some easter eggs and secret areas. i also lowered the encounter rate as that was the main complaint

also. warning for arachnophobes, theres a spider dungeon

if you found this... congratz! heres an early version of what ive been working on. if you play, please message my tumblr the-serpentgamer

list of what changed:

i checked every transfer player event and they all SEEM to be working

i lowered encounter rates

i added easter eggs and secret rooms

remy and picani are now somewhere in the game for you guys to find (idk if their places are too obvious. i think i might have made it too obvious, especially in remy’s case)

i added health bars

i added a tutorial
